projects.project: GeoRMS Platform - Army Corps of Engineers
responsibilities: Architected Python/Pandas ETL pipeline processing geospatial data with React/Electron frontend using Leaflet, Turf.js, Recharts, and Zustand state management.
Developed ML event detection algorithm and data quality framework for automated validation and anomaly detection.
Built time-series visualization and analytics dashboards for operational intelligence.
Developed enterprise asset management system using C# .NET, Vue.js/Vuetify, MS SQL Server for statewide infrastructure lifecycle modeling.
Optimized complex stored procedures and APIs supporting proprietary simulation engine for budget/deterioration forecasting.
Managed Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines and Microsoft Azure cloud deployments.

experience.title: Senior Java Web Developer
responsibilities: Modernized insurance systems with Java/Spring Boot microservices, Docker containers, and Kubernetes orchestration.
Built payment processing (Authorize.NET), third-party integrations, and Drools rules engine for rating/premium calculations.
Integrated modern portals with legacy IBMi DB2 databases ensuring seamless data migration.

experience.title: Software Engineer in Test
responsibilities: Developed Python/Locust performance testing suites identifying critical bottlenecks and scalability issues.
Maintained and enhanced Cypress.js UI test automation framework for comprehensive QA coverage.
Led "one-man performance testing team" before transitioning to full-stack test automation role.

experience.title: Java Engineer
responsibilities: Developed Spring Boot APIs orchestrating JMeter/Gatling performance tests with MySQL database for result analytics.
Containerized testing infrastructure deployed to Kubernetes/OpenShift environments.
Created enterprise-wide performance monitoring dashboards and automated test execution frameworks.
